str2: Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I entertain a stranger, (b) I startle, bewilder. From xenos; to be a host; by implication, be strange.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A burning, trial, fiery test. From puroo; ignition, i.e., smelting.
From peirazo; a putting to proof (of good), experience (of evil), solicitation, discipline or provocation); by implication, adversity.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Feminine Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
Apparently a primary word; foreign; by implication, a guest or entertainer.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Neuter Singular
str2: To happen, occur, meet. From sun and the base of basis; to walk together, i.e. Concur.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
